aiAssistant.title: AI Assistant
aiAssistant.welcome: Hi! I'm your AI research assistant. I can help you generate an outline for your research paper. Just tell me your topic or paste your abstract.
aiAssistant.error: Sorry, I encountered an error. Please try again.
aiAssistant.success: I've generated an outline for your research paper. You can see it in the editor.
